plot: After losing the man she loves to her cousin, a woman gets her hopes up when he is widowed.
title: Pehli Nazar Ka Pehla Pyaar: Love at First Sight
plot_es: After losing the man she loves to her cousin, a woman gets her hopes up when he is widowed.
original_name: Pehli Nazar Ka Pehla Pyaar: Love at First Sight
plot_en: After losing the man she loves to her cousin, a woman gets her hopes up when he is widowed.
